Text: Maintenance Work at Meters Cc conversation today with Lorraine Ibrom PGE El Paso she has informed me that some maintenance work is being done on the Yeary sp in line This will affect meters PGE Riverside and PGE Agua Dulce beginning at PM on January and ending at am on January She has informed me that for this time period there should be no nominations at these points Thanks

Meters In Gary Hanks asked me to add an additional nom to meters to make it total I asked you about it and you said that you would probably have to increase the Reliant EnergyEntex nom Deal In the meantime I added the additional volume to strangers gas so that gas control could see a nom I have been allocating all the gas to Reliant for For do you want to increase those noms Let me know

Re Tuesday December th Cc be here Mary NRON AM To Michael nron Tom NRON Clem CT Robert CT Jackie CT Sabrae CT Carlos J CT Mark nron Aimee CT Mary nron Eddie nron cc Daren J CT Lauri A CT Subject Tuesday December th We will need a small staff to handle potential trades for Wed the th Most of the pipelines are out of the office so I would expect the work load to be minimal I plan on coming in and would like to have a minimum of three on staff so I need two volunteers one offsystem just in case If anyone is going to be in town please forward a number in case we need to call any additional people in or have you work on a laptop from home I will get with you after the new year to make up the holiday you miss or you can schedule your day now I have the calendars Also I will be out on vacation Friday Dec nd and will need someone to send the nominations to the plants I dont expect to have full system coverage just HPLHPL and HPLENA as needed Let me know if you are interested in learning how to do this Thank you Mary

Increase MDQ for contract Cc Can you please increase HPLCs MDQ for contract from MMBTUs to MMBTUs effective December I believe Lauri Allen already spoke to you regarding this matter If any other information is needed please contact me at ext or Lauri Allen at ext Thank you for your help

Big Thicket Allocation Cc After speaking with Gary Lamphier Big Thickets allocation for PecosRobersons portion will be done differently Historically their portion of the allocation was reduced for shrinkage Effective with October s allocation shrink will no longer be deducted The full amount of PecosRobersons gas received at meter and delivered out at meter Vastar will be kept whole I spoke with your contact Harold McGee at Big Thicket and he spoke with PecosRoberson regarding this and everyone is agreement Your allocation process will be done the same however the PecosRoberson number on the allocation statement will no longer have shrinkage deducted I have gone over the numbers for October with Harold and he has stated the is the amount that will be allocated to PecosRoberson will go to Jay and will be for Enron this portion has always been kept whole Can you please make sure that this is done If there are any questions please let me know Thanks

CLECO Deals State Tract Meter Cc Anita I just wanted to recap our discussion to be sure that we are all on the same page From my understanding the allocation for meter State Tract is supplied from Bryancy Braumley Prior to Bryancy would calculate flow from certain wellheads total this volume and then send us an allocation that would show how much gas was allocated to Texas General Land and HPL Sale from CLECO at meter Effective a compressor was put in and the gas from now flows through this compressor as well as the gas from meter Deal Sales from Dewbre and is now measured at meter Tivoli Station For Bryancys allocation she must take the meter statement from meter and deduct meter s flow Once this is done she can take that net number and do an allocation between Texas General Land and HPL CLECO like she has done previously I believe meter is now a check meter and meter is the actual pay meter For there were two deals in place for the sale from CLECO deal and Per discussions with Daren Farmer Danny Conner and Jennifer Martinez I have been instructed to zero out the deal for and use as the correct deal number Therefore Fred Boas and I have zeroed out the deal and placed the volume that was allocated there to deal Deal was priced at ship less which was incorrect and deal is priced at ship less Therefore an adjustment will generate for for the difference in price and the change in location The allocated volume for CLECO did not change However I am not sure that Bryancy is allocating the volume properly between Texas General Land and HPL CLECO I have spoke to her as well as Jennifer Martinez and Curtis Funderbruk with CLECO so there might be some PMAs for volume differences In addition I have changed the allocation method at meter to be a calloutswing effect For October and succeeding months the volume should be computed by taking meter deducting out meter Then Byancy should take this net number and split it between Texas General Land and HPL CLECO The Texas General Land nom is currently at meter and the HPL Cleco deal is at meter Fred mentioned that the Texas General Land nom might need to be moved to meter but nothing has been decided on that yet Please let me know if something I have stated is not your understanding or you need something more done on my end Also let me know who is going to be doing this monthly allocation It might be beneficial to have one person doing all the points meters Thanks for your help

rd Party Maintenance at Meter for th th Cc I just spoke with Lorraine PGE and she informed me that there is going to be some rd party maintenance done which will affect meter Riverside This will begin AM on the th but PGE will keep the noms whole for the th should have no noms

VastarBig Thicket Cc Per our meeting yesterday I have set up the necessary usage tickets I could not set up just one bc they can only be set up for approx months at a time Therefore I had to set up usage tickets which are listed below to Sitara Deal to Sitara Deal to Sitara Deal to Sitara Deal to Sitara Deal to Sitara Deal to Sitara Deal For I will go back and repath it for the st through th so it should be correct when you allocate it Let me know when you have the track ids for the other months Thanks

Work at PGE Meters Riverside and Agua Dulce Cc and are back up Intradays for can be done Thanks Forwarded by Sabrae ZajacHOUECT on AM Enron Capital Trade Resources Corp From Sabrae Zajac AM To Stella L CT Kimberly CT Jackie CT Aimee CT Robert E CT Carlos J CT Tom NRON Pat NRON Mark nron Eddie nron Mary nron Susan nron cc Edward D CT Lauri A CT Daren J CT Elsa CT Danny nron Gary A CT Earl CT James CT Subject Work at PGE Meters Riverside and Agua Dulce Per my conversation today with Lorraine Ibrom PGE she has informed that some maintenance work is being done at Yeary Midway in This will affect meters PGE Riverside and PGE Agua Dulce beginning at am on Sunday Sept and ending at am on Thursday Sept at am She has informed me that for this time period there should be no nominations at these points Thanks

Bryancy Braumley Prior to Bryancy would calculate flow from certain wellheads total this volume and then send us an allocation that would show how much gas was allocated to Texas General Land and HPL Sale from CLECO at meter Effective a compressor was put in and the gas from now flows through this compressor as well as the gas from meter Deal Sales from Dewbre and is now measured at meter Tivoli Station For Bryancys allocation she must take the meter statement from meter and deduct meter s flow Once this is done she can take that net number and do an allocation between Texas General Land and HPL CLECO like she has done previously I believe meter is now a check meter and meter is the actual pay meter For there were two deals in place for the sale from CLECO deal and Per discussions with Daren Farmer Danny Conner and Jennifer Martinez I have been instructed to zero out the deal for and use as the correct deal number Therefore Fred Boas and I have zeroed out the deal and placed the volume that was allocated there to deal Deal was priced at ship less which was incorrect and deal is priced at ship less Therefore an adjustment will generate for for the difference in price and the Re Tuesday December th Cc be here Mary NRON AM To Michael nron Tom NRON Clem CT Robert CT Jackie CT Sabrae CT Carlos J CT Mark nron Aimee CT Mary nron Eddie nron cc Daren J CT Lauri A CT Subject Tuesday December th We will need a small staff to handle potential trades for Wed the th Most of the pipelines are out of the office so I would expect the work load to be minimal I plan on coming in and would like to have a minimum of three on staff so I need two volunteers one offsystem just in case If anyone is going to be in town please forward a number in case we need to call any additional people in or have you work on a laptop from home I will get with you after the new year to make up the holiday you miss or you can schedule your day now I have the calendars Also I will be out on vacation Friday Dec nd and will need someone to send the nominations to the plants I dont expect to have full system coverage just HPLHPL and HPLENA as needed Let me know if you are interested in learning how to do this Thank you Mary

FW Duke Energy Field Services Cc Megan I found Dannys book and he has the deal priced at I adjusted the price in Sitara Let me know if anything further is needed Forwarded by Sabrae ZajacHOUECT on PM From Daren J nronXgate on AM To Sabrae CT cc Subject FW Duke Energy Field Services Sabrae See if you can find Dannys deal book and verify the price for the deal listed below D Original Message From Parker Megan Sent Tuesday May PM To Daren J NRON Subject Duke Energy Field Services For once his is not a Panenergy question For sale deal DEFS says the price on should be and we have in Sitara Can you confirm this price for me Megan

Re Tuesday December th Cc be here Mary NRON AM To Michael nron Tom NRON Clem CT Robert CT Jackie CT Sabrae CT Carlos J CT Mark nron Aimee CT Mary nron Eddie nron cc Daren J CT Lauri A CT Subject Tuesday December th We will need a small staff to handle potential trades for Wed the th Most of the pipelines are out of the office so I would expect the work load to be minimal I plan on coming in and would like to have a minimum of three on staff so I need two volunteers one offsystem just in case If anyone is going to be in town please forward a number in case we need to call any additional people in or have you work on a laptop from home I will get with you after the new year to make up the holiday you miss or you can schedule your day now I have the calendars Also I will be out on vacation Friday Dec nd and will need someone to send the nominations to the plants I dont expect to have full system coverage just HPLHPL and HPLENA as needed Let me know if you are interested in learning how to do this Thank you Mary

Re NOM ACTUAL VOLS FOR THJpst Forwarded by Sabrae ZajacHOUECT on PM Enron Capital Trade Resources Corp From Eileen Ponton AM To DAVILATXUCOM CSTONETXUCOM MJONESTXUCOM HPL NRONCOM LIZ NRONCOM NRONCOM cc Subject Re NOM ACTUAL VOLS FOR TH I will agree with your nomination of Forwarded by Eileen PontonHoustonPEFSPEC on AM Charlie Stone To Eileen Ponton cstonetxu cc David Avila Melissa Jones com HPL NRONCOM LIZ NRONCOM NRONCOM Subject Re NOM ACTUAL VOLS FOR TH PM We do not agree with the nominated volume Our records reflect the following nom schedule rate eff hrs through hour beginning hrs rate eff hrs through hour beginning hrs rate eff hrs through hour beginning hrs Total Nominated Please review your source data and let us know if you agree with the above Thanks CCS Eileen Ponton on PM To David U Charlie U Melissa U HPL NRONCOM LIZ NRONCOM NRONCOM cc Subject NOM ACTUAL VOLS FOR TH NOM MCF MMBTU
